alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 8:37PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of west central Salt Lake...south central Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 837 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Delle to 17 miles northwest of Grantsville. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, Stansbury Park, Delle, Magna, Lake Point and Antelope Island State Park. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 64 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
